name: run_zapier_NLA_action
description: Execute a specific Zapier action,e.g. searching an email from your Gmail.

action_id.description: A specific action ID (from list actions) of the action to execute(the set api_key must be associated with the action owner).Can be retrieved using list_zapier_NLA_actions.

instructions.description: a natural language instruction string for using the action(e.g. "get the latest email from Mike Knoop" for "Gmail: find email" action).

zapier_description.description: Description for the action to be performed.

sync.description: Weather to execute the action synchronously.

name: list_zapier_NLA_actions
description: This tool returns a list of the Zapier user's exposed actions.

sync.description: Weather to execute the search synchronously.

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.description: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
